plot: In order to impress the girl of his dreams, a teen boy plans to steal his neighbor's prized car, setting off a chain of unforeseen events that will change his life forever.
title: Damn Pretty Thing
plot_es: In order to impress the girl of his dreams, a teen boy plans to steal his neighbor's prized car, setting off a chain of unforeseen events that will change his life forever.
plot_en: In order to impress the girl of his dreams, a teen boy plans to steal his neighbor's prized car, setting off a chain of unforeseen events that will change his life forever.
